aboutUs: Automensor is a Saugor, Madhya Pradesh-based home automation startup delivering affordable, reliable smart home solutions across India. Powered by Next.js web/apps, Supabase backend, and IoT tech, we make homes smarter, safer, and energy-efficient. We prioritize quality products, seamless installation, local support, and 100% customer satisfaction.
products:
1. Smart LED Bulbs: WiFi/Bluetooth bulbs with app/voice control (Alexa/Google), color-changing, scheduling, 8W energy-saving. Price: ₹499 - ₹799.
2. Motion & Door Sensors: PIR motion and magnetic sensors for instant app alerts, security automation. Battery-powered, wireless. Price: ₹399/pack of 2.
3. Smart Hub: Central WiFi/Zigbee controller for 50+ devices, remote access via secure dashboard. Price: ₹2,499.
4. Smart Plugs: Remote plugs with energy monitoring, timers for fans/ACs. 220V Indian sockets. Price: ₹299 each.
5. Automated Curtains & Fans: Motorized blinds/fans with voice/app control and scheduling. Price: ₹1,499 - ₹2,999.
6. Security Cameras: 1080p HD indoor/outdoor cams, night vision, motion detection, Cloudinary cloud storage. Price: ₹1,199.
7. Installation Service: Pro doorstep setup, wiring, app integration in Saugor/MP. Price: ₹999 + products.
8. Custom Smart Home Design: Personalized automation plans with Clerk-secured user portals. Price: Starts ₹5,000.
9. Maintenance Plan: Annual remote support, updates via WhatsApp. Price: ₹1,999/year.
